name: Performance I
description: Emphasis is initially placed on ensemble, non-verbal, and improvisational work. Students proceed to the application of their acquired skills to scripted material. Students may apply in their first or second year of University. The Application Deadline is March 10th for the first round of auditions; August 3rd for the second round. See Audition Guidelines for information on how to apply.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: An audition in April or in August. Students can apply directly out of high school.
